title: animal letters
content:
i am looking for someone to design a set of animal alphabet letters. each letter must be a separate image so it can be loaded into a flash program

 [‹ Feijoa in use: 2 great samples](http://web.archive.org/web/20081202063745/http:/www.typophile.com/node/49765 "Go to previous forum topic") [Looking for complementary font to Arial for WEB ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20081202063745/http:/www.typophile.com/node/49751 "Go to next forum topic")
author: beefie1977
